overview: In 2000 in the jungles of Panama, a young journalist, named Ana, has a chance encounter with a tiny orphaned sloth, which she names Velcro. For nearly two years, the pair is inseparable until finally Ana travels up a remote river to reintroduce Velcro back to the wild. This is the story Anaâ€™s return to Central and South America to see how much has changed since Velcro came into her life.
title: A Sloth Named Velcro
